thread.title: Jimmy Fallon Injures His Other Hand at Harvard Award Celebration
thread.title_full: Jimmy Fallon Injures His Other Hand at Harvard Award Celebration

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Jimmy Fallon Injures His Other Hand at Harvard Award Celebration
text:
Comments The 'Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon' host trips and falls to the ground while holding a bottle. 
Jimmy Fallon took a tumble during an event where he was honored by the Harvard Lampoon, the university's humor magazine. The comedian who badly injured his left hand earlier this year has recently hurt his right hand when he fell to the ground while holding a bottle of Jaegermeister. "It was all part of the celebration in the street and some random girl kneeled down in front of him abruptly as he was turning around and he tripped over her because he didn't see her," a source explained what happened to PEOPLE. A video posted by cryan ryan (@cryan__ryan) on Oct 24, 2015 at 6:52pm PDT " The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon " reportedly made a trip to Massachusetts General Hospital but he was fine. He took to Instagram to assure fans that it was just a minor injury. "Nothing that a few band aids couldn't fix," he wrote along with a picture of his hand. A photo posted by Jimmy Fallon (@jimmyfallon) on Oct 25, 2015 at 11:24am PDT
